script:
1). I suggest consulting a lawyer before signing a contract.
No, I don't want to work in consulting.
Yes, that's what I'm planning to do. 
He studied international law.
2). Have you ever used this kind of machine?
The new copiers are great.
Yes, a couple of months ago. 
I've never seen an arrangement like this.
3). When can you deliver the order to our warehouse?
By the end of the week. 
By courier would be fastest.
It's on Main Street by the docks.
